plot: 10 episodes, 10 couples, 10 break-ups. Through laughs and tears, this original comedy series explores the emotional journey of ten couples, at the precise moment in which one must face his fears and announce the truth to his partner.
plot_en: 10 episodes, 10 couples, 10 break-ups. Through laughs and tears, this original comedy series explores the emotional journey of ten couples, at the precise moment in which one must face his fears and announce the truth to his partner.
plot_es: 10 episodes, 10 couples, 10 break-ups. Through laughs and tears, this original comedy series explores the emotional journey of ten couples, at the precise moment in which one must face his fears and announce the truth to his partner.
title: Break-ups: La série
